courses.name: Programming Languages for Web Applications
courses.description: Introduces full-stack web development basics, starting with best practices in UI design and then moving to frameworks and deployment

courses.name: Mobile Application Development
courses.description: Focuses on mobile app architecture and development and deployment on Android

courses.name: Artificial Intelligence
courses.description: Explores machine learning, neural networks, and intelligent agent design focusing on search algorithms

courses.name: Database Systems
courses.description: Surveys machine learning, neural networks, and intelligent agent design focusing on search algorithms

courses.name: Intro to Cybersecurity
courses.description: Offers experimentation with a wide range of cybersecurity topics like SQL injection and encryption in a Linux VM

courses.name: Advanced Software Development
courses.description: Emphasizes full-stack web development with agile methodologies and team collaboration

courses.name: Data Structures & Algorithms II
courses.description: Highlights advanced algorithms, complexity analysis, and optimization techniques

courses.name: Algorithmic Economics
courses.description: Investigates the intersection of algorithms and economic theory, using machine learning models to analyze dynamic marketplaces and agent decision making

courses.name: Game Theory
courses.description: Analyzes the theory of strategically interdependent decision making with applications to auctions, bargaining, oligopoly, signaling, and strategic voting

courses.name: Sustainability Economics
courses.description: Explains why we have environmental problems like pollution & global warming and how to solve them under a microeconomic lens

courses.name: Introduction to Econometrics
courses.description: Applies economic statistical principles to solve complex problems

courses.name: Money and Banking
courses.description: Studies the role of money in the economic system emphasizing monetary policy and theory
